proj.label: 35181 El Camino Capistrano
proj.title: Panoramic Pacific Views
proj.fourFeatures: Own Your Peace of Ocean,Tantalizing Coastal Breezes,Clean Sandy Beaches,Oceanfront Paradise Estate
proj.description: Mediterranean Villa on An Ocean Front Bluff. Imagine the romance of enjoying each and every day with an Up Close, Unobstructed, Ocean, Coastline and Whitewater View, from Every Single Room in Your Home! A Double Wide Lot on a Single Loaded Street Offers Unparalleled Privacy. Combine This with Over 5,000 Sqft of elegant living spaces (est. 3,800 under roof & over 1,200 of Decks) and neither you nor your guests will ever want to leave. Motivated Seller Relocated Out of State...Act Fast.

proj.label: 83 Ritz Cove Drive
proj.title: Nature Privatized
proj.fourFeatures: Magnificance an Understatement,The Pacific is Yours,Remarkable Views Abundant,Country Club Luxuries,Distinguished Community
proj.description: An exceptional opportunity located in the prestigious gated 'ocean front' community of Ritz Cove! Custom built contemporary/meditteranean residence! 5 bed/4.5 baths! Open & spacious with cathedral ceilings! Light & bright! Extensive use of marble & granite! Center island kitchen w/ breakfast nook, 72' Sub-zero fridge/freezer! 3! 24 hour guard gated! Walking distance to the Ritz Carlton & St. Regis resorts! Walk to the beach via private gated access! Won't last long!
